DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to find the optimal dose of once daily oral neladenoson bialanate (BAY1067197) when given in addition to appropriate therapy for specific comorbidities.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial to Study Neladenoson Bialanate Over 20 Weeks in Patients With Chronic Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction
